div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Mar. 7, 1895. CONTRIBUTIONS FOR ST. HYACINTH CHURCH

body.p: The Reverend J. Piochowski wishes to acknowledge the following contributions for the new St. Hyacinth Church at Avondale:
St. Stanislaus Kostka Society, $25; St. Stephen Society, $10; Jacok Wejer Society, $10; Holy Name of Mary Society, $25; A. Osuch, $1; Magdalene Szulc, $5.
The Reverend Piochowski extends sincere thanks to the contributors.
